detectors.description:
NinjaCAP._transfer(address,address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#179-225) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.timestamp == _launchedAt (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#188)

NinjaCAP.addLiquidity() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#289-297) ignores return value by IERC20(uniswapV2Pair).approve(address(uniswapV2Router),type()(uint256).max) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#296)

NinjaCAP.addLiquidity() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#289-297) ignores return value by uniswapV2Router.addLiquidityETH{value: address(this).balance}(address(this),balanceOf(address(this)),0,0,owner(),block.timestamp) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#295)

NinjaCAP.allowance(address,address).owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#156) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#52-54) (function)

NinjaCAP._approve(address,address,uint256).owner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#172) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#52-54) (function)

NinjaCAP.updateTaxAdd(address).newAddress (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#350) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _TaxAdd = address(newAddress) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#352)

Ownable.constructor().msgSender (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#47) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _owner = msgSender (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#48)

NinjaCAP.constructor(address).TaxAdd (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#133) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _TaxAdd = TaxAdd (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/33cf4028c580724354475a73f01e7972badaf8b2_NinjaCAP.sol#134)
